tasks.title: Enhance Mobile Responsiveness
tasks.description: Improve mobile optimization and PWA features for better mobile experience
tasks.details: Implement responsive design improvements, touch interactions, and Progressive Web App features including offline functionality and app-like experience. Focus on mobile-first design principles and ensure all features work seamlessly on mobile devices.
tasks.testStrategy: Test on various mobile devices and screen sizes, verify PWA installation, test offline functionality

subtasks.title: Implement Responsive Design Improvements
subtasks.description: Update CSS and component layouts to work seamlessly across all screen sizes
subtasks.details: Review current mobile responsiveness and implement improvements to ensure all components work well on mobile devices. Focus on touch-friendly interactions, proper spacing, and readable text sizes.

subtasks.title: Add PWA Features and Offline Functionality
subtasks.description: Implement Progressive Web App features including service worker and offline capabilities
subtasks.details: Add service worker for offline functionality, implement app manifest for PWA installation, and ensure the app works without internet connection for basic features.

subtasks.title: Optimize Touch Interactions
subtasks.description: Improve touch gestures and interactions for mobile devices
subtasks.details: Enhance touch interactions including swipe gestures, touch-friendly buttons, and mobile-optimized navigation. Ensure all interactive elements are properly sized for touch input.

subtasks.title: Test and Validate Mobile Experience
subtasks.description: Comprehensive testing across different mobile devices and screen sizes
subtasks.details: Test the app on various mobile devices, screen sizes, and browsers. Validate PWA installation, offline functionality, and overall mobile user experience. Document any issues found and create fixes.

tasks.title: Advanced Task Filtering and Search
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive task filtering and search functionality
tasks.details: Add advanced filtering options by category, priority, difficulty, due date, and tags. Implement search functionality with real-time results. Include saved filter presets and quick filter buttons for common use cases.
tasks.testStrategy: Test all filter combinations, search accuracy, performance with large task lists

tasks.title: Task Templates and Quick Actions
tasks.description: Create task templates and quick action system for faster task creation
tasks.details: Implement task templates for common activities, quick action buttons for frequently used tasks, and template management system. Allow users to create, save, and share custom templates.
tasks.testStrategy: Test template creation, quick actions, template sharing functionality

tasks.title: Enhanced Habit Analytics
tasks.description: Improve habit tracking with detailed analytics and insights
tasks.details: Add comprehensive habit analytics including streak patterns, completion rates, habit correlation analysis, and personalized insights. Implement habit performance tracking and improvement recommendations.
tasks.testStrategy: Test analytics accuracy, performance with long-term habit data, insight generation

tasks.title: Performance Optimizations
tasks.description: Optimize app performance and implement caching strategies
tasks.details: Implement performance optimizations including code splitting, lazy loading, efficient state management, and caching strategies. Focus on reducing load times and improving overall app responsiveness.
tasks.testStrategy: Measure performance improvements, test caching effectiveness, monitor memory usage

tasks.title: User Profiles and Sharing
tasks.description: Implement user profiles and social sharing features
tasks.details: Create user profile system with customizable profiles, achievement showcases, and social sharing capabilities. Allow users to share achievements, progress, and custom content with the community.
tasks.testStrategy: Test profile creation, sharing functionality, privacy settings

tasks.title: Community Challenges
tasks.details: Implement community challenges system with leaderboards, collaborative goals, and social competition features. Create challenge creation tools and participation tracking.
tasks.testStrategy: Test challenge creation, leaderboard functionality, community participation

tasks.title: Comprehensive Analytics Dashboard
tasks.description: Create advanced analytics dashboard with detailed insights
tasks.details: Build comprehensive analytics dashboard with productivity patterns, progress tracking, performance insights, and personalized recommendations. Include data visualization and export functionality.
tasks.testStrategy: Test analytics accuracy, dashboard performance, data visualization quality

tasks.title: Export and Backup System
tasks.description: Implement data export and backup functionality
tasks.details: Create comprehensive data export and backup system allowing users to export their data in various formats, backup to cloud storage, and restore from backups. Include data migration tools.
tasks.testStrategy: Test export functionality, backup reliability, data integrity verification

tasks.title: Custom Themes and Personalization
tasks.description: Add custom themes and advanced personalization options
tasks.details: Implement custom theme system with color schemes, typography options, and layout customization. Allow users to create and share custom themes with the community.
tasks.testStrategy: Test theme creation, customization options, theme sharing functionality

tasks.title: Achievement System E2E Tests
tasks.description: Create comprehensive e2e tests for the Achievement System unlock flows and celebrations
tasks.details: Implement e2e tests for the achievement system including: achievement unlock flows (First Steps, Dam Builder, Ancient Wisdom), progress tracking with visual progress bars, category filtering (Progression/Mastery/Consistency/Exploration/Special), achievement persistence across browser sessions, and rarity-based celebrations (Common/Legendary visual effects). Test the complete user journey from task completion to achievement unlock celebration.
tasks.testStrategy: Test achievement unlock flows, progress tracking, category filtering, persistence, and celebration effects across different browsers and devices

tasks.title: Habit System E2E Tests
tasks.description: Create e2e tests for Habit System frequency logic and streak tracking
tasks.details: Implement e2e tests for the habit system including: habit frequency logic (daily/weekly/monthly completion rules), streak calculation across different frequencies, habit conversion to tasks, stat rewards (Body/Mind/Soul) on completion, and habit data persistence across browser refresh. Test complex scenarios like streak breaks and frequency transitions.
tasks.testStrategy: Test habit frequency logic, streak calculations, stat rewards, and data persistence with various habit types and completion patterns

tasks.title: Data Persistence E2E Tests
tasks.description: Create e2e tests for auto-save functionality and data recovery
tasks.details: Implement e2e tests for data persistence including: auto-save functionality during user interactions, data recovery after browser crash/refresh, storage limits handling when localStorage is full, data export/import functionality, and cross-session persistence verification. Test the complete data lifecycle from creation to recovery.
tasks.testStrategy: Test auto-save triggers, data recovery scenarios, storage error handling, and export/import functionality across different browsers

tasks.title: Synthesizer E2E Tests
tasks.description: Create e2e tests for multi-track synthesizer functionality
tasks.details: Implement e2e tests for the synthesizer including: multi-track management (creating, muting, soloing tracks), sequencer functionality (pattern creation and playback), effects chain (enabling/disabling effects per track), audio context initialization and playback, and track settings persistence across sessions. Test the complete audio workflow from track creation to playback.
tasks.testStrategy: Test multi-track operations, sequencer functionality, audio playback, and track persistence with various audio configurations

tasks.title: User Progression E2E Tests
tasks.description: Create e2e tests for XP, leveling, and stat progression systems
tasks.details: Implement e2e tests for user progression including: XP accumulation from tasks/habits, level progression mechanics, stat rewards (Body/Mind/Soul) accumulation, and progression persistence across sessions. Test the complete progression journey from first task to high-level achievements.
tasks.testStrategy: Test XP calculations, level progression, stat accumulation, and progression persistence with various task/habit completion scenarios

tasks.title: Error Handling E2E Tests
tasks.description: Create e2e tests for offline functionality and error recovery
tasks.details: Implement e2e tests for error handling including: offline functionality when internet is unavailable, storage errors when localStorage fails, invalid data recovery from corrupted data, and browser compatibility across different browsers/devices. Test graceful degradation and error recovery scenarios.
tasks.testStrategy: Test offline functionality, storage error handling, data corruption recovery, and cross-browser compatibility
